Question
========
Which of the following are scalars? *Select all that apply.*

Answerlist
----------
* distance
* speed
* time
* acceleration
* displacement
* velocity

Solution
========
A scalar quantity is fully described by magnitude only. A vector quantity is fully described by both magnitude and direction. Distance, speed, and time are scalars. Acceleration, displacement, and velocity are vectors.

Answerlist
----------
* scalar
* scalar
* scalar
* vector
* vector
* vector
